info.name: deviantArt Eclipse Redesign
info.description: Eclipse Redesign shall not only bring back the feeling of the old deviantart, but also help your orientation by making the general appearance smaller and add more colours as separators.
info.additionalInfo:
Do not contact me over here! Message me over deviantart, I don't get any notifications here. 
Also be aware that about every 2 weeks dA is making updates that brings the style to break. I'll fix it as soon as I can.

All updates can be seen here: 
https://www.deviantart.com/isi-daddy/journal/Eclipse-Redesign-Update-4th-January-21-839089048

I'll not update this description. So just check out dA.

~ ~

Some changes changes:
- notification page: 
* comments in the look of the old dA
* changed appearance for group stacks of messages and activity feed
* "Original" shows prior message

- watch page:
* thumbs for deviations, status, journal and commissions have been made smaller

- other
* journals have been widened 
* default white background for small deviations has been removed
* shadow behind deviation has been removed
